mapper.select: SELECT PROJ_NO, (SELECT PROJ_NM FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE PROJ_NO = A.PROJ_NO)PROJ_NM, TITLE, DYTM_STRT_DT, DRFT_DT, PPRR_ID, REM, FIN_UPDR_ID, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FIN_UPDR_ID) FIN_UPDR_NM, TO_CHAR(FIN_MDFY_DT,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') fin_mdfy_dt, F_GETWEEK(DRFT_DT) GET_WEEK FROM DYAFFR_RPT A WHERE PROJ_NO = #{map.proj_no} AND DRFT_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(#{map.strt_dt},'-'),1,8),'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(#{map.fnh_dt},'-'),1,8),'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY DRFT_DT DESC
